criticism: Integer overflow in the mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential trap for the owner. This vulnerability is exploited in the mintToken function.
Integer overflow in the burn function allows the owner to set the total supply to any value, causing a potential trap for the owner. This vulnerability is exploited in the burn function.
The transferFrom function allows asset theft due to incorrect access control for the 'from' address. This vulnerability is exploited in the transferFrom function.
The sell function allows attackers to always win the random number game and obtain a large amount of tokens. This vulnerability is exploited in the sell function.
Integer overflow in the buy function allows a potential trap for the seller. This vulnerability is exploited in the buy function.
